name: BB Fiene
description:
Controls :

Moving Right = D

Moving Left = A

Jumping = Space 

Sprinting  = Shift 

Details :

Your searching for your sister, who is stuck in another dimension. The game starts off where he is furious and angry. In the game's beta they're wont be a lot of levels or monsters but they're will be platforms and much much more etc.

Give BB Fiene a try, I am sure its in your genre and if it isn't let me know, I will take all your feedback. :)  - please remember to be respectful.

SpeedRun :

I might add speed run to the game, if Back Home grows a reasonable audience. That being said the beta doesn't count, so the speed run might be thrown in once the game is complete or after as a add on. SpeedRun will have a long amount of levels, and they're will be a timer. Monsters,bosses,platforms,saws,blades and a lot more.

Info :

This game is made by Michael Somerville, in beta and is not done yet. going to work more on it but this is a preview and a vision on what the game is going to be based on  give it a try and tell me what you think thank you.
